kv20.3:2.1: ☑ Atthi manussesu kammakāraṇā, atthi ca kāraṇikāti?
kv20.3:2.3: Atthi nirayesu kammakāraṇā, atthi ca kāraṇikāti?
kv20.3:2.5: atthi nirayesu kammakāraṇā, natthi ca kāraṇikāti?
kv20.3:2.7: Atthi manussesu kammakāraṇā, natthi ca kāraṇikāti?
kv20.3:6.4: “tamenaṃ, bhikkhave, nirayapālā pañcavidhabandhanaṃ nāma kāraṇaṃ kārenti—
kv20.3:6.5: tattaṃ ayokhīlaṃ hatthe gamenti, tattaṃ ayokhīlaṃ dutiye hatthe gamenti, tattaṃ ayokhīlaṃ pāde gamenti, tattaṃ ayokhīlaṃ dutiye pāde gamenti, tattaṃ ayokhīlaṃ majjheurasmiṃ gamenti;
kv20.3:6.6: so tattha dukkhā tibbā kaṭukā vedanā vedeti;
kv20.3:6.7: na ca tāva kālaṃ karoti yāva na taṃ pāpakammaṃ byantī hotī”ti.
kv20.3:7.5: tamenaṃ, bhikkhave, nirayapālā uddhampādaṃ adhosiraṃ ṭhapetvā vāsīhi tacchanti …pe…
kv20.3:7.6: tamenaṃ, bhikkhave, nirayapālā rathe yojetvā ādittāya pathaviyā sampajjalitāya sajotibhūtāya sārentipi paccāsārentipi …pe…
kv20.3:7.7: tamenaṃ, bhikkhave, nirayapālā mahantaṃ aṅgārapabbataṃ ādittaṃ sampajjalitaṃ sajotibhūtaṃ āropentipi oropentipi …pe…
kv20.3:7.8: tamenaṃ, bhikkhave, nirayapālā uddhampādaṃ adhosiraṃ gahetvā tattāya lohakumbhiyā pakkhipanti ādittāya sampajjalitāya sajotibhūtāya.
kv20.3:7.9: So tattha pheṇuddehakaṃ paccati, so tattha pheṇuddehakaṃ paccamāno sakimpi uddhaṃ gacchati, sakimpi adho gacchati, sakimpi tiriyaṃ gacchati.
kv20.3:7.10: So tattha dukkhā tibbā kaṭukā vedanā vedayati, na ca tāva kālaṃ karoti yāva na taṃ pāpakammaṃ byantīhoti.
